archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.2.2b: b) each account (or group of accounts) is assigned rights or privileges for one or more target systems (e.g. applications, systems, system components, networks, collaboration platforms or services)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
